title: Fishy001
author: Fishy001
created_time: November 13, 2022, 01:09:26 AMLast edit: November 13, 2022, 11:41:17 AM by Fishy001
content: . If i work hard. 1 year i can build a business that make 1.5-2k every day on autopilot. Then come to a casino like a real king make 2k blackjack bets and 10k roullete without giving a shit kf i lose or not.Now i make only 400 a day which is ok cause i can stay on nice hotels in latin amerrica and fuck  hookers every day everyday, play in casinos and atill save a lot of money.But i want more money more power and i need to direct my energy on my work and being productive.People like drake don't have 1million to put on sportbook on stake from being good gamblers. They have business . All the people in vegas who play poker hands with 50k buy in. Probanly havr some business unless they sold their house and look double / triple their money fast.I want to be part of these guys who regularly sit on these tables and for this i need to work and have a lot of power form my work.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: That's how gambling works. Your hard earned money from work, business or whatever the source is, majority of it will go to gambling if you are a gambler lol. Don't expect a dream of making thousands on gambling, autopilot doesn't mean always win, it's a dream of every gambler until they experience worst.Drake is a millionaire or even billionaire already earned from his work and business. Gambling is just a mere hobby and past time of him. Lossing millions is nothing to him, winning is a bonus.

comments.body: Quote from: Fishy001 on November 13, 2022, 01:09:26 AM. If i work hard. 1 year i can build a business that make 1.5-2k every day on autopilot. Then come to a casino like a real king make 2k blackjack bets and 10k roullete without giving a shit kf i lose or not.We all dream of making money on autopilot what kind of work do you have in mind that will make money on autopilot can you share with the community?QuoteNow i make only 400 a day which is ok cause i can stay on nice hotels in latin amerrica and fuck  hookers every day everyday, play in casinos and atill save a lot of money.But i want more money more power and i need to direct my energy on my work and being productive.Fucking hookers will sap your money and your energy if you want more money then set up a business I don't recommend playing in casinos there's no guarantee you can make money out of it, and you will eventually lose in the end.QuotePeople like drake don't have 1million to put on sportbook on stake from being good gamblers. They have business . All the people in vegas who play poker hands with 50k buy in.I want to be part of these guys and for this i need to work and have a lot of power form my work.Then minimize your gambling and concentrate on establishing a business first if you have a good business that makes a lot of money you can gamble every single day and create a harem of hookers .

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: Lol, didn't you are the guy who keep posted your gambling result on few threads?Start a bussiness isn't easy, even you want your bussiness start by "autopilot" while you just started it. Not sure just in 1 year, you can let your bussiness to become "autopilot".But i agree, most of successful people have their own bussiness to backup their financial, not by do gamble.Quote from: Fishy001 on November 13, 2022, 01:09:26 AM.Now i make only 400 a day which is ok cause i can stay on nice hotels in latin amerrica and fuck  hookers every day everyday, play in casinos and atill save a lot of money.Lol what a way to waste your money, instead of that, you can use that money for something else which more productive.

comments.author: Genemind
comments.body: I'm not sure if you are dreaming to make it big to be able to gamble and live a luxurious life. If this is your aim in working hard, all your effort and hard work will be for nothing if you just want to be a high roller someday, sipping champagne, sitting in VIP spots, and fucking hookers. It's good that you have the motivation to make your dream work, however, what you dream of right now might ruin your life in the future. Focus on what you have to do, and achieve your dream, and along your way you might find even more valuable dreams. I am rooting for you, and hope you can achieve what you aim for. Good luck on your venture.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: You still have a better life than many people, but you don’t care about it. Gambling and greed has made you blind mate. I appreciate your effort that you want to do hard work and increase your business’s returns. But you want to use that profit to gamble? Getting huge money in shorter period is very risky, instead you can use it in some type of investment? That will have less risk and will yield you less money for longer period of time. This is just my suggestion OP, rest is upto you.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: You can still gamble while working really. I myself do that, I just control it in a way that doesn't affect my work at all, even with the amount of money I'm spending on gambling. Overindulging in luxuries, especially from money earned in gambling can be quite bad imo since it isn't a "constant" source of profit but rather an "immediate" one. Drake himself has the money because of all the influence he has built up over the course of his career. It wasn't an "immediate" type of thing, it was a gradual one. We may see big amounts of sponsorships or amounts of money spent by him as irregular cause of of the amount (huge ones), but that's the price of his entire career and not an "that moment only" type.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Fishy001 on November 13, 2022, 01:09:26 AM1 year i can build a business that make 1.5-2k every day on autopilot.I don't know what you're doing wasting your time, then, with your stories if you're able to create passive income of between $500k-$700k annually. If you didn't overdose on Doritos and Monster maybe you wouldn't say the bullshit you say or, in the unlikely event that you were able to generate that money, you would already be generating it instead of just saying it, being a big mouth, and coming here to tell your gambling bullshit stories.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: Quote from: Fishy001 on November 13, 2022, 01:09:26 AMI want to be part of these guys who regularly sit on these tables and for this i need to work and have a lot of power form my work. hard work to make a lot of money and spend it on bets on the gambling table. You have to calculate your chances of getting caught up in a losing streak. and it might take all the money out of your business and work if you don't practice good financial management.those who already have strong jobs and finances. will not be affected by losing in the casino. I've seen several people who ended up losing their business because of a casino mistake.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Man cmon, let's quit making these topics that have no meaning. You have 1 thread that says you won xx doing blah blah. Then another thread you won and now are quitting. And I think a 3rd thread where you were back gambling the next day. You're not gonna quit so what's the point? I'm not batching saying I hope you don't achieve whatever goals you want to achieve, but quit making threads if you're just gonna be a hypocrite a day later.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: If you quit gambling because you're want to focus on your work, then it's mean there's a problem with your gambling activities. Gambling is just like a party, you need it every weekend since you've stress for working entire 5 days, so you need to have fun or refresh your body. If you only gamble what you can afford to lose, you will gamble for fun and you wouldn't think gambling is just wasting time or make you lose.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: QuoteNow I only earn 400 a day which is ok because I can stay in nice hotels in Latin America and every day I get to hook up, play in casinos and save a lot of moneyWhere is the big money you won in crypto gambling every day? You always brag here on the forum that you always win gambling, then now you say you only make 400$ in a day, does that mean you are really just arrogant OP? Just asking only....QuoteBut I want more money and more power and I need to direct my energy to my work and productivity.It seems that by wanting this to happen OP, you are showing us that you are a greedy and money-grubbing person, and what kind of job do you want then?
